decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): BBC-0818-P01 SITE LOCATION; BBC-0818-P02 EXISTING FRONT REAR AND SIDE ELEVATIONS; BBC-0818-P03 PROPOSED FRONT REAR AND SIDE ELEVATIONS; BBC-0818-P04 PROPOSED WINDOWS AND DOORS ELEVATIONS; BBC-0818-P05 PROPOSED CROSS SECTION SASH WINDOWS DETAILS 1; BBC-0818-P06 PROPOSED CROSS SECTION SASH WINDOWS DETAILS 2; BBC-0818-P07 PROPOSED CROSS SECTION CASEMENT WINDOWS DETAILS; BBC-0818-P08 PROPOSED CROSS SECTION DOUBLE DOOR DETAILS 1; BBC-0818-P09 PROPOSED CROSS SECTION DOUBLE DOOR DETAILS 2; THE DESIGN AND ACCES STATEMENT PREPARED BY BASE BUILDING CONSULTANCY DATED JUNE 2023
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be as per the submitted application form or approved drawings (Condition 2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan (Reg.18), policies D3 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021) - sections 12 and 16.
description: Replacement of existing windows and doors with double glazed timber windows and doors to match existing
